css:
<style>
	.print-format table, .print-format tr, 
	.print-format td, .print-format div, .print-format p {
		font-family: Monospace;
		line-height: 200%;
		vertical-align: middle;
	}
	@media screen {
		.print-format {
			width: 4in;
			padding: 0.25in;
			min-height: 8in;
		}
	}
</style>

Address: CAIRO EGYPT El Obour city

License Number : 1 License Date : 10/10/2000
